title: Sight
description: A comprehensive web application created for a Master's dissertation. It serves as a platform for data scraping, data visualization, and interactive graphing.

title: Covac
description: A Flutter-based hybrid app for locating nearby COVID-19 vaccination centers, booking appointments, and storing vaccination records, simplifying the process of getting vaccinated.

title: CMS Flutter
description: A hybrid application designed to imitate an inventory system, capable of monitoring sales, managing stock bookings, and providing point-of-sale functionality, thereby streamlining the inventory management process.

title: Sija
description: A dynamic and immersive platform designed to showcase the potential of a ecommerce business. SIJA has been thoughtfully crafted to provide an engaging and seamless user experience.

title: Niharika Travels
description: A web application built for a Canadian travel agency which provides an interactive platform for users to book travel packages, view destinations, and get information about travel arrangements.
